snippet: The deal will further expand Google's ambitions in the travel business, Julie Bosman reports for The New York Times. Wiley, a 200-year-old publisher based in Hoboken, N.J., is using the proceeds to bolster its trade and educational businesses. Terms...
abstract: The deal will further expand Google's ambitions in the travel business, Julie Bosman reports for The New York Times. Wiley, a 200-year-old publisher based in Hoboken, N.J., is using the proceeds to bolster its trade and educational businesses. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

headline.main: Google to Buy Frommer's From Wiley Publishing
